00025 #include "util/Fs.h"

00040 
00041 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00042 #pragma warning(disable:4786)
00043 #define _CRT_SECURE_NO_WARNINGS // To disable localtime function warning
00044 #endif
00045 
00046 #ifdef _DEBUG
00047 #ifndef _WIN64
00048 #include "../external/vld/vld.h"
00049 #endif

00053 using namespace std;
00054 
00055 int main(int argc,const char* argv[]) 
00056 {
00057   ofstream logOut;
00058   LogStream log;
00059   string logName;
00060 
00061   try 
00062   {
00063 
00064     AnnotationConverterEngine engine;
00065     
00066     const string version = AptVersionInfo::version();
00067     const string cvsId = AptVersionInfo::cvsId();
00068     const string versionToReport = AptVersionInfo::versionToReport();
00069     const string execGuid = affxutil::Guid::GenerateNewGuid();
00070     
00071     
00072     /* Parse options. *///$$
00073     engine.setUsage(
00074     "apt-annotation-converter - A program for importing an annotation text files,\n"
00075     "                           into the annotation database. \n"
00076     "\n"
00077     "usage:\n"
00078     "Import a single file:\n"
00079     "apt-annotation-converter.exe -db-template Homo_sapiens.dbtemplate -db-file GenomeWideSNP_6.na30.annot.db  -tsv-file GenomeWideSNP_6.na30.annot.csv -array-set GenomeWideSNP_6 -array-config GenomeWideSNP_6.arrayconfig\n\n"
00080     "Import a list of files:\n"
00081     "apt-annotation-converter.exe -db-template Homo_sapiens.dbtemplate -db-file GenomeWideSNP_6.na30.annot.db  -tsv-files ListOfTsvToLoad.txt -array-set GenomeWideSNP_6 -array-config GenomeWideSNP_6.arrayconfig\n\n"
00082     "Import using the analysis_job job file:\n"
00083     "apt-annotation-converter.exe -xml-file  Axiom_GW_Hu.analysis_job\n");
00084     
00085     
00086     engine.programPath = argv[0]; 
00087     engine.parseArgv(argv);
00088     Verbose::setLevel(engine.getOptInt("verbose"));
00089     const string progName = Fs::basename(engine.getProgName());    
00090     engine.setOpt("command-line",engine.commandLine());
00091     engine.setOpt("program-name",progName);
00092     engine.setOpt("program-company","Affymetrix");
00093     engine.setOpt("program-version",version);
00094     engine.setOpt("program-cvs-id",cvsId);
00095     engine.setOpt("version-to-report",versionToReport);
00096     engine.setOpt("exec-guid",execGuid);
00097     if(argc == 1) { engine.setOpt("help","true"); }
00098     
00099     // Check Options. Will print out version/help if requested then exit.
00100     engine.checkOptions();
00101     
00102     /*std::string outdir = Fs::dirname(engine.getOpt("summary-out-file"));
00103     Fs::ensureWriteableDirPath(outdir);*/
00104 
00105     // Set up the logging and message handlers.
00106     std::stringstream logFileName;
00107     
00108     time_t now = time(NULL);
00109     tm *timeinfo = localtime (&now);
00110     char buf[256];      
00111         strftime(buf, sizeof(buf), "%Y-%m-%dT%H_%M_%S", timeinfo);
00112 
00113     logFileName << "apt-annotation-converter." << buf << ".log";        
00114     engine.openStandardLog(logFileName.str(),logOut,log);
00115     
00116     engine.run();
00117   } 
00118   catch(...) {
00119       Verbose::out(0,"Unexpected Error: uncaught exception.");
00120       // Close log files
00121       logOut.close();
00122       return 1;
00123   }
00124   // Close log files
00125   logOut.close();
00126     
00127   return 0;
00128 }
